markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, the arising of intentions regarding sights … intentions regarding thoughts … is the manifestation of old age and death. The cessation of intentions regarding sights … intentions regarding thoughts … is the ending of old age and death.”

SN.26.8. Taṇhāsutta (“Craving”)
